meta.title: MSD Wayne Township | We Are Wayne - Great Schools, Great Community

meta.name: description
meta.content: MSD Wayne Township’s forward-thinking vision to provide schools and communities focused on Every Learner — Child through Adulthood, Achieving Excellence Every Day in Every Way requires having exceptional talent at every level of the organization. With over 2,000 employees we understand that each one plays a vital role in supporting students and school system operations.
MSD Wayne Township | We Are Wayne - Great Schools, Great Community

MSD Wayne Township’s forward-thinking vision to provide schools and communities focused on Every Learner — Child through Adulthood, Achieving Excellence Every Day in Every Way requires having exceptional talent at every level of the organization. With over 2,000 employees we understand that each one plays a vital role in supporting students and school system operations.

h2.a: Apply to Work in MSD Wayne

p.span: In MSD Wayne Township, each of our students is more than a number, more than a test score.

div.p: While we have become so trained to focus on standardized testing data — and I agree it has its place — I challenge you to get engaged in our schools to see first-hand the amazing work happening each and every day with all of our students. Success is prevalent throughout our district and measured individually, student by student. In Wayne, our students come first and we make decisions that best serve the needs of all of them.

img.alt: District Taking Steps to Respond to Coronavirus if Necessary
